application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 27 (works on site within 5m of the strategic water main) and 28 (Piling Method Statement) of Planning Permission 19/01207/FUL (Alterations and extensions of existing student Seething Wells Campus to provide additional student accommodation and ancillary facilities. Rooftop extensions to existing buildings to provide 159 new student rooms, alterations to Listed Buildings to provide a caf√©, flexible meeting and recreation spaces and other ancillary facilities), previously approved on references 19/02856/CLC and 20/01157/CLC. Revised piling layout required for extensions adjacent Accomodation Blocks A and C.
